name: Dominance of Earth
description: When your active character is protected by a Shield Character Status or a Shield Combat Status, your Summons deal +1 Geo DMG.
descriptionraw: When your active character is protected by a $[K6] Character Status or a $[K6] Combat Status, your Summons deal +1 $[K106].
descriptionreplaced: When your active character is protected by a {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> Character Status or a {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color> Combat Status, your Summons deal +1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2106}<color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color>.
